title: Gnar should of been a girl...
body: because when I think prehistoric, I think Chrono Trigger! Think of all the Ayla references and jokes they could have made! Oh well :( Also I only own female champions cause i'm weird and a girl or something. {{champion:143}}

replies.body:
> Maybe it is?   :)

No it's a he.
Well, I can see where this is going.
Probably best to just leave it be, no sense in getting into an argument over someone's take on the situation.
Well then. That's just your opinion, brah.

Yeah, but then "she" couldn't have been fluffy. Female yordles look like gnomes.

Female Yordle physical characteristics would make a design like Gnar way more stressful to work around.
